so_54554364: shuf -n 1 <(seq 9 | grep -Fxv -e{3,8})

shuf -n 1 <(printf %s\\n 1 2 4 5 6 7 9)

shuf -n 1 <(printf %s\\n 1 2 {4..7} 9)

shuf -n 1 <(seq 2; seq 4 7; echo 9)

ul_430056: shuf file | xargs wget

man 1 shuf

shuf file | while read url; do
    wget --user-agent="$(shuf -n1 uas)" "$url"
done

so_58894982: #! /bin/bash

symbols='0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIGKLMNOPQRSTUVYXWZ~#$&_+-=/\'  # Stupid SO: '
count_symbols=${#symbols}
(( length = RANDOM % 6 + 10 ))
password=""
for i in $(seq 1 $length) ; do
    password+=${symbols:RANDOM % count_symbols:1}
done
echo "$password"

ul_430056: for i in $(seq 0 $((${#data_link[@]} -1)) | shuf); do
    wget -U "${user_agent[RANDOM % ${#user_agent[@]}]}" "${data_link[i]}"
done
